message.body: Hey, looking at tickets for Longwood. They are open Christmas Day. I was thinking we could go at like 5? That would still be daylight but we would be there long enough to enjoy the lights when the sun goes down. They are timed entrance tickets.
Perfect!
Bring warmies!!! Its going to be 35 degrees
And its indoor and out
Mom text me this morning. Shes still waiting for her phone to turn on but shes going to find a phone today so she can increase her auto insurance for the rental car
I got the girls visa gift cards so the can do their own shopping... Still didnt get anything for mom yet
Do Frankie and "the other cat" wear collars?
Good to hear about mom. Cats are microchipped and don't wear collars. I haven't gotten mom anything. Got you something very small.
I think im going to give mom a visa gift card too... Shes an adult, if she wants to blow it, so be it... Maybe we can encourage her to get some new clothes (hoodies, boots) at king of prussia
I think that's a good idea. I'm going to get her a candle andybe the same thing. I was gonna get her warm Clothes but she should Pick them out
Yeah. Realistically, new hoodies or fleece pullovers. Maybe a pair of jeans and a GOOD pair of boots to support her ankles
I got the girls 2 bottles of nail polish each just to have something to open
Whats the other cats name?

I just talked to mom. Phil is such a jerk. Hes been mailing emma presents everyday but nothing for olivia. He got emma a gibson guitar, $160 sneakers... But nothing for olivia. That infuriates me. Thats so sad.
Omg. The mental anguish that will cause her is unbelievable.
Doesn't he realize this is WHY she doesn't want to see him?
I wish there was something I could do for her.
Ugh he sucks.
He's supposed to be an adult. He's retarded.
Im so thankful that shes so smart but that doesnt mean it doesnt hurt still. I might sneak her a lil something extra.
Me too. He's also putting Emma in a weird position.
Things are coming together.
Emma is oblivious tho... Im sure shes in heaven
What little things do u want or need
I need a new loufa
Done
Merrrry xmas
Awesome!!!!!
The room DoES have a dvd player
Bought elf
Your room looks awesome!!
Sweet!! Yeah it's feeling more like home.
